verses.verse: And<WG2532> I heard<WG191> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> out of<WG1537> the temple<WG3485> saying<WG3004> to the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32>, Go your ways<WG5217>, and<WG2532> pour out<WG1632> the vials<WG5357> of the wrath<WG2372> of God<WG2316> upon<WG1519> the earth<WG1093>.

And<WG2532> the first<WG4413> went<WG565>, and<WG2532> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>; and<WG2532> there fell<WG1096> a noisome<WG2556> and<WG2532> grievous<WG4190> sore<WG1668> upon<WG1519> the men<WG444> which<WG3588> had<WG2192> the mark<WG5480> of the beast<WG2342>, and<WG2532> upon them which worshipped<WG4352> his<WG846> image<WG1504>.

And<WG2532> the second<WG1208> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1519> the sea<WG2281>; and<WG2532> it became<WG1096> as<WG5613> the blood<WG129> of a dead<WG3498> man: and<WG2532> every<WG3956> living<WG2198> soul<WG5590> died<WG599> in<WG1722> the sea<WG2281>.

And<WG2532> the third<WG5154> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1519> the rivers<WG4215> and<WG2532> <WG1519> fountains<WG4077> of waters<WG5204>; and<WG2532> they became<WG1096> blood<WG129>.

And<WG2532> I heard<WG191> the angel<WG32> of the waters<WG5204> say<WG3004>, Thou art<WG1488> righteous<WG1342>, O Lord<WG2962>, which<WG3588> art<WG5607> <WG3801>, and<WG2532> wast<WG2258> <WG3801>, and<WG2532> shalt be<WG3741> <WG3801>, because<WG3754> thou hast judged<WG2919> thus<WG5023>.

For<WG3754> they have shed<WG1632> the blood<WG129> of saints<WG40> and<WG2532> prophets<WG4396>, and<WG2532> thou hast given<WG1325> them<WG846> blood<WG129> to drink<WG4095>; for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> worthy<WG514>.

And<WG2532> I heard<WG191> another<WG243> out of<WG1537> the altar<WG2379> say<WG3004>, Even so<WG3483>, Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> Almighty<WG3841>, true<WG228> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> are thy<WG4675> judgments<WG2920>.

And<WG2532> the fourth<WG5067> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the sun<WG2246>; and<WG2532> power was given<WG1325> unto him<WG846> to scorch<WG2739> men<WG444> with<WG1722> fire<WG4442>.

And<WG2532> men<WG444> were scorched<WG2739> with great<WG3173> heat<WG2738>, and<WG2532> blasphemed<WG987> the name<WG3686> of God<WG2316>, which<WG3588> hath<WG2192> power<WG1849> over<WG1909> these<WG5025> plagues<WG4127>: and<WG2532> they repented<WG3340> not<WG3756> to give<WG1325> him<WG846> glory<WG1391>. scorched: or, burned

And<WG2532> the fifth<WG3991> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the seat<WG2362> of the beast<WG2342>; and<WG2532> his<WG846> kingdom<WG932> was<WG1096> full of darkness<WG4656>; and<WG2532> they gnawed<WG3145> their<WG846> tongues<WG1100> for<WG1537> pain<WG4192>,

And<WG2532> blasphemed<WG987> the God<WG2316> of heaven<WG3772> because of<WG1537> their<WG846> pains<WG4192> and<WG2532> <WG1537> their<WG846> sores<WG1668>, and<WG2532> repented<WG3340> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> their<WG846> deeds<WG2041>.

And<WG2532> the sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the great<WG3173> river<WG4215> Euphrates<WG2166>; and<WG2532> the water<WG5204> thereof<WG846> was dried up<WG3583>, that<WG2443> the way<WG3598> of the kings<WG935> of<WG575> the east<WG395> <WG2246> might be prepared<WG2090>.

And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> three<WG5140> unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151> like<WG3664> frogs<WG944> come out of<WG1537> the mouth<WG4750> of the dragon<WG1404>, and<WG2532> out of<WG1537> the mouth<WG4750> of the beast<WG2342>, and<WG2532> out of<WG1537> the mouth<WG4750> of the false prophet<WG5578>.

For<WG1063> they are<WG1526> the spirits<WG4151> of devils<WG1142>, working<WG4160> miracles<WG4592>, which go forth<WG1607> <WG3739> <WG1607> unto<WG1909> the kings<WG935> of the earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> of the whole<WG3650> world<WG3625>, to gather<WG4863> them<WG846> to<WG1519> the battle<WG4171> of that<WG1565> great<WG3173> day<WG2250> of God<WG2316> Almighty<WG3841>.

Behold<WG2400>, I come<WG2064> as<WG5613> a thief<WG2812>. Blessed<WG3107> is he that watcheth<WG1127>, and<WG2532> keepeth<WG5083> his<WG846> garments<WG2440>, lest<WG3363> he walk<WG4043> naked<WG1131>, and<WG2532> they see<WG991> his<WG846> shame<WG808>.
And<WG2532> he gathered<WG4863> them<WG846> together<WG4863> into<WG1519> a place<WG5117> called<WG2564> in the Hebrew tongue<WG1447> Armageddon<WG717>.

And<WG2532> the seventh<WG1442> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG846> vial<WG5357> into<WG1519> the air<WG109>; and<WG2532> there came<WG1831> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> out of<WG575> the temple<WG3485> of heaven<WG3772>, from<WG575> the throne<WG2362>, saying<WG3004>, It is done<WG1096>.

And<WG2532> there were<WG1096> voices<WG5456>, and<WG2532> thunders<WG1027>, and<WG2532> lightnings<WG796>; and<WG2532> there was<WG1096> a great<WG3173> earthquake<WG4578>, such as<WG3634> was<WG1096> not<WG3756> since<WG3739> <WG575> men<WG444> were<WG1096> upon<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>, so mighty<WG5082> an earthquake<WG4578>, and so<WG3779> great<WG3173>.

And<WG2532> the great<WG3173> city<WG4172> was divided<WG1096> into<WG1519> three<WG5140> parts<WG3313>, and<WG2532> the cities<WG4172> of the nations<WG1484> fell<WG4098>: and<WG2532> great<WG3173> Babylon<WG897> came in remembrance<WG3415> before<WG1799> God<WG2316>, to give<WG1325> unto her<WG846> the cup<WG4221> of the wine<WG3631> of the fierceness<WG2372> of his<WG846> wrath<WG3709>.
And<WG2532> every<WG3956> island<WG3520> fled away<WG5343>, and<WG2532> the mountains<WG3735> were<WG2147> not<WG3756> found<WG2147>.

And<WG2532> there fell<WG2597> upon<WG1909> men<WG444> a great<WG3173> hail<WG5464> out of<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, every stone about<WG5613> the weight of a talent<WG5006>: and<WG2532> men<WG444> blasphemed<WG987> God<WG2316> because of<WG1537> the plague<WG4127> of the hail<WG5464>; for<WG3754> the plague<WG4127> thereof<WG846> was<WG2076> exceeding<WG4970> great<WG3173>.
